name: outbreak
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 a time when something suddenly begins, especially a disease or something else dangerous or unpleasant: an outbreak of cholera/food poisoning/rioting/war Last weekend saw further thundery outbreaks.

the start of somethingbeginningLet's go back to the beginning. Can you tell me when you arrived at the crime scene?startI didn't like him from the very start.endThis is it – the end of the tour. openingThe opening of the ceremony was marred by protest.commencementWhat is the commencement date of their contract?kick-offWhat time is the kick-off for the banquet and show?
